nodes.text: Albrek was a male noble from the planet Alderaan who was nearing the age of seventy by the time of the Galactic War. He and his son Albrek were broke, but they attempted to buy weapons from Magaran and promised to sell them to a number of different buyers. Tanno Vik posed as Magaran and tricked them into meeting with the buyers and then killed the entire group with grenades.
